projects.name: Musical Academy UI project
projects.description: Architected a responsive web application using NextJS, TypeScript, and ReactJS, reducing load time by 40%. Deployed 10+ modern UI components from Aceternity UI, creating a sleek interface with positive user feedback. Exploited NextJS features like server-side rendering and API routes, improving initial page load speed by 60%.

projects.name: Project Management System
projects.description: Constructed a project management system for the university, with a scope of 50% reduction in paperwork. Employed Tailwind CSS for efficient, responsive styling, ensuring compatibility across 20+ device types and screen sizes.

projects.name: Videotube (Video streaming + Twitter project)
projects.description: Spearheaded a comprehensive full-stack video streaming web application featuring integrated tweets. Attained a 40% reduction in potential bugs and increased productivity by 1.5x.

projects.name: SocialX blockchain-based Social Media Web App (Hackathon project)
projects.description: Led a cross-functional team to develop a decentralized social media platform in a 48-hour hackathon. Personally designed and implemented front-end design, contributing to winning 3rd prize.

experiences.description: Engineered a responsive restaurant portal and admin panel using ReactJS, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, serving 100+ restaurants. Integrated state management with Redux Toolkit, reducing data fetch times by 30% across 20+ complex features. Coordinated with the backend team to integrate RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless functionality for 500+ daily users. Leveraged NextUI components to create user-friendly interfaces, improving overall user experience.

full_output.name: Ankit Kumar
achievements_and_awards: Won the 'Best App for Community' track in Soft CodeHack 2.0, by PHICSIT Community. November 2023
Acquired 2nd rank in the Hackmaze Hackathon, GGSIPU-EDC Delhi. October 2023
Earned 1st place at Elicit'23 Hacks 8.0, a national-level hackathon facilitated by MUJ ACM. October 2023
Secured 3rd position in the national-scale hackathon IEEE CIS, MNIT Jaipur organized. September 2023
Achieved 1st rank in the national-tier hackathon Octahacks5 hosted by Chitkara University. February 2023
Attained institute 1st rank in the competitive coding contest Code-It-On by IEEE, MUJ. October 2022
Solved 200+ DSA problems on Leetcode and Geeksforgeeks
